lines.text: No! I'm too young to die. Too young and too handsome!
[looks in the mirror]
Well, I'm too young.
I hear you have done much traveling. Are you familiar with the Great Wall of China?
No, but I know a big fence in Chicago!
Say, what do we know about society?
Well startin' tomorrow we're gonna learn. We gotta act like gentlemen so these dames we married won't have any excuse for throwing us out.
You mean to say I can't go to sleep with my shoes on?
That's exactly what I mean now get to bed, like a gentleman.
Hey, hey, hey you'd better watch that cough first you know you'll wind up with pneumonia.
They say strawberries are good for a cold.
Strawberries won't be in season for six months.
We'll wait.
We'll wait.
We'll wait.
Just a minute!

[the sisters propose a toast]
Here's to us, three new widows!

[Moe throws the cake on Mrs. Gottrocks by accident after the butler hits him deliberately]
He did it.
Thank you...
[Hits him in the face with a pie]
But you started it!
Most parties bore me. But I know I'm gonna get a big bang out of this one.
[a pie hits him in the face]
